product_name: Black Diamond B.D.V. Hoody Jacket - Men's
long_description: The men's Black Diamond B.D.V. Hoody Jacket is a highly dynamic soft shell for protective coverage during blustery days at the crag or on alpine ridge scrambles. Made of Schoeller(R) stretch-woven soft-shell fabric, a half-zip pullover design and a minimalist feature set, ideal for fast-paced mountain pursuits in variable conditions. NanoSphere(R) fabric finish resists water, oil and dirt. Climbing-specific gusseted underarm panels free up overhead reach. Adjustable, helmet-compatible hood, stretch cuffs and drawcord hem help seal in warmth. Jacket stows in own zip chest pocket; loop lets you clip it to your harness or rack. Black Diamond B.D.V. Hoody Jacket is named for the Black Diamond Verticals climbing collection.
short_description: The men's Black Diamond B.D.V. Hoody Jacket is a highly dynamic soft shell for protective coverage during blustery days at the crag or on alpine ridge scrambles.
